This will also keep him in close if you are using circle attack/runes. After movement, shoot shoot move. • Second attack is typically jump attack then immediate meteors. If you can get one shot off in between these attacks go for it, but not at the cost of eating a meteor. After the meteors fall, shoot shoot move. • Lastly, you have the flame shot that splits into 6. The triangle method is perfect to avoid this because it may be a charge. Avoid the flame, possibly shoot, move to avoid the flame spread, shoot again. September 26, 2025 meteor is also impact by elemental dmg right? as it has different elements too Shadowfax88 Legendary Archer 9/26/25, 10:34 AM Yes, meteors cause supplemental elemental damage. The elemental damage aspect can crit if you have lucky shadow. The explosive meteor damage itself only crits if you have the meteor crit rate enchantment The base 5% crit rate is considered global crit rate. This impacts main weapon, sword strikes and non-explosive meteors. Elemental base crit rate is determined by luck. If you run lucky shadow, I believe the base rate is 10%. This can be increased by elemental crit rate +% enchants on runes and the elemental crit etched. All other (circles, sprites and explosive meteors) have a base crit of 0%. These can only be increased by their specific crit rate +% enchants (except for circles if you have mythic sawblade where circles inherit main weapon crit) Explosions never crit (for example... xbow explosion on hit and other dragoon gear) Awesomethanu Senior Archer 9/26/25, 12:00 PM back to this, it is the same for crit dmg right? if i use xbow with meteor and i have meteor crit rate enchant but dont have meteor crit dmg, does the normal crit dmg applies? or same as crit rate, normal crit dmg works on MW, SWORD STRIKES AND NON EXPLOSIVE METOERS? back to this, it is the same for crit dmg right? if i use xbow with meteor and i have meteor crit rate enchant but dont have meteor crit dmg, does the normal crit dmg applies? This will also keep him in close if you are using circle attack/runes. After movement, shoot shoot move. • Second attack is typically jump attack then immediate meteors. If you can get one shot off in between these attacks go for it, but not at the cost of eating a meteor. After the meteors fall, shoot shoot move. • Lastly, you have the flame shot that splits into 6. The triangle method is perfect to avoid this because it may be a charge. Avoid the flame, possibly shoot, move to avoid the flame spread, shoot again. This will also keep him in close if you are using circle attack/runes. After movement, shoot shoot move. • Second attack is typically jump attack then immediate meteors. If you can get one shot off in between these attacks go for it, but not at the cost of eating a meteor. After the meteors fall, shoot shoot move. • Lastly, you have the flame shot that splits into 6. The triangle method is perfect to avoid this because it may be a charge. Avoid the flame, possibly shoot, move to avoid the flame spread, shoot again. A rolling bowling boulder attack that eventually splits into 6. The big boulder will also track/follow. , (If this big boulder hits a wall, it will not split and will disappear) A triple rock split. , (Edit) Lastly, he also shoots 5 fast boulders at that are mostly guaranteed hits if you are close to him. , (If you freeze or paralyze him, he will never throw these) • This boss will always throw with his right arm. • My trick is to stand mostly in between him in the center and the wall. This is in the hopes when he tosses the boulder, it will cancel. If it’s the triple rock split you’re still good to go. , • The biggest point is to always rotate to dodge in a counterclockwise direction. This is to have to better chance of dodging the tosses. This is because it prevents someone from sniping you and dropping you in the rankings after you have improved your rankings. And since the arena becomes unplayable 10 minutes before the daily reset, it is recommended to start playing 20-30 minutes before the reset. You could save your tickets and use them all at once on the last day, but I don't know if I would recommend that since you would be wasting 5 tickets each day. Does tickets stack? , , Yes. If you have 0-5 tickets when daily reset, it will reset to 5 tickets. If you have 6 or more, the number won't change. Every day, you can gain 3 more by doing daily tasks, 5 more by buying with gems, 50 more by buying with guild coins. Regarding other modes, ⁠unknown Is there a way to skip the battle? , , The first option is to buy a monthly card.
